952490.name: Hello Charlotte: Heaven's Gate
952490.description:
You're hidden behind the lines.
I reach out, deafened by silence.
As we mourn the Grasshopper's passing,
Heaven's gate opens.

  • Heaven's Gate is a quiet kinetic novel by etherane
  • Average reading time: 40 min
  • Genre: slice of life, coming-of-age, drama
  • This is a story set in a parallel universe with a focus on True Realm characters from Hello Charlotte series. Therefore, playing Hello Charlotte first is advised.
  • This DLC has a canon-compliant extra story - "Diary".
